text: The Saudi Arabian Football Federation (; SAFF) is the governing body of football in Saudi Arabia. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded in 1956 and joined FIFA in the same year. It also became a member of AFC in 1972. It is launch bid host of 2034 FIFA World Cup. == National team == Men *Senior national team *Under-23 national team Women *Senior national team == Related pages == *Saudi Arabia national football team == References == == Other websites == * Category:1956 establishments in Asia Category:1950s establishments in Saudi Arabia Category:Football governing bodies in Asia Category:Football in Saudi Arabia Category:Sports organizations of Saudi Arabia
title: Saudi Arabia Football Federation
